title: Out of the forest
creator_credit: Stephen Clarkson, A. Frank Bundy, United Steel Companies and Wallace Productions
brief_description: Shows some of the remarkable range of chemical products which have their origin in coal. Explains the production of coke for the blast furnaces used by steel companies.
